actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to declare portions of Stamford Harbor in Fairfield County, Connecticut nonnavigable.

summary.text: Declares specified portions of Stamford Harbor, Fairfield County, Connecticut, to be nonnavigable waters within the meaning of the Constitution and laws of the United States. Provides that such declaration applies only to described portions which are either bulkheaded and filled or occupied by permanent pile-supported structures on the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to declare portions of Stamford Harbor in Fairfield County, Connecticut nonnavigable.
